name: Pardus's Trial
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GDN Festive Jam.
It's more of a prototype than a full game in its current state, but be sure to check back for a post jam version in the coming days if you liked it!

You are Pardus, a slime creature who've been punished by the goddess Nix, and have been given a harsh trial as a result. Will you give up or will you endure your fate and earn your place as the retainer of the goddess?

Controls:

WASD - Move
Left mouse button - Create / Remove Shadow of the Past
Right Mouse button Create / Remove Shadow of the Future
E - InteractR - Restart to checkpoint

Use Shadows of the Past to respawn when you die.
Use Shadows of the Future to teleport by interacting with a black altar.
Use the shadows effectively to pass levels.
